pullrequest.title: Add functionality to generate the aggregated SDFormat description via CMake

content.raw:
I made two small changes to the cmake setup for the sdf_descriptions target:

* call `make sdf_descriptions` in the pipeline right after `cmake ..` in 863da8d (failed in this commit)
* set `IGN_CONFIG_PATH` and add target dependency to fix pipeline in 60a00da
content.html:
I made two small changes to the cmake setup for the sdf_descriptions target:

  • call make sdf_descriptions in the pipeline right after cmake .. in 863da8d (failed in this commit)
  • set IGN_CONFIG_PATH and add target dependency to fix pipeline in 60a00da
